body.p: The Tintri VMstore™ is the first storage product designed from the ground up to provide storage for virtual machines (VMs) and virtual disks. OpenStack® works with the Tintri® Cinder Volume Driver. The Tintri Cinder Volume Driver enables you to create, attach, clone and delete volumes, create and delete snapshots, and quickly provision volumes from Glance images. Tintri® OS 4.0 and above enables VM-level visibility of statistics including IOPS, throughput, and latency. Statistics are also available through the Tintri® REST API.
Specifically, Helion OpenStack works with the TinTri Cinder Volume Driver. This TinTri product allows you to manage the following areas:

ul.li: Volumes - create, attach, clone, and delete volumes
Glance images – provision volumes quickly with images
Statistics – VM-level of visibility in TinTri VMstore OS 4.0, including Input/Output Operations Per Second (IOPS), throughput and latency. Statistics are also available through the REST API.
